document_data.name: ''Ceremonial Garments of the Black Orchid''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''ceremonial garments of the Black Orchid''''' were enchanted [[robe]]s that belonged to the [[aarakocra]] people of [[Kir Sabal]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''garments of the Black Orchid'' were magical vestments that increased the wearer's defense, as well as aided them in channeling the powers of the [[Wind Dukes of Aaqa]] during rituals of the ''[[Dance of the Seven Winds]]''. The ritual bestowed temporary flight upon its subjects.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Asharra]]: the [[aarakocra]] [[wizard]] leader of Kir Sabal in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
